Cleaning 1.2.1 All analytes with \(\geq 50\%\) missing values (NA or \(0\) or \(<0\)) were removed. na.data <- data %>% mutate(across(-(1:7), ~if_else(. <= 1e-6, NA, .))) %>% filter(`Rat ID` != "107_Rd3") %>% select(-`Animal Num Per Phenotype`, -Phenotype...3, -Phenotype) bad.compound <- na.data %>% select(-(1:7)) %>% summarize(across(everything(), ~sum(is.na(.))/n())) %>% pivot_longer(everything(), names_to = "compound", values_to = "missing") %>% filter(missing >= 0.5) %>% pull(compound) other.var <- c("Time", "Rat ID", "PavCA Index", "Sex") good.compound <- setdiff(names(na.data), bad.compound) good.compound <- good.compound[!(good.compound %in% other.var)] good.long.data <- na.data %>% select(all_of(c(other.var, good.compound))) id.var <- other.var[other.var != "Time"] Analytes removed due to \(\geq 50\%\) missing values: 5HIAA, 3MT, E, DA 1.2.2 New Phenotypes were defined based on cutoffs \(\in \{0.3, 0.4, 0.5\}\) ST: PavCA \(\geq\) cutoff IN: \(-\)cutoff \(<\) PavCA \(<\) cutoff GT: PavCA \(\leq\) \(-\)cutoff mod.data <- good.long.data %>% pivot_wider(names_from = `Time`, values_from = all_of(good.compound)) %>% mutate(across(-all_of(id.var), ~replace_na(., min(., na.rm = TRUE)/5))) %>% mutate( Phenotype3 = factor( if_else(is.na(`PavCA Index`), "Control", if_else(abs(`PavCA Index`) < 0.3, "IN", if_else(`PavCA Index` >= 0.3, "ST", "GT"))), levels = c("Control", "ST", "IN", "GT")), Phenotype4 = factor( if_else(is.na(`PavCA Index`), "Control", if_else(abs(`PavCA Index`) < 0.4, "IN", if_else(`PavCA Index` >= 0.4, "ST", "GT"))), levels = c("Control", "ST", "IN", "GT")), Phenotype5 = factor( if_else(is.na(`PavCA Index`), "Control", if_else(abs(`PavCA Index`) < 0.5, "IN", if_else(`PavCA Index` >= 0.5, "ST", "GT"))), levels = c("Control", "ST", "IN", "GT")), .after = `PavCA Index` ) %>% mutate(across( .cols = ends_with("Pre"), .fns = ~ get(sub("_Pre", "_Post", cur_column())) - ., .names = "{.col}_Change" ) ) %>% rename_with( .fn = ~str_replace(., "_Pre_Change", "_Change"), all_of(contains("Pre_Change")) ) # all.data <- mod.data all.data <- mod.data %>% rename(PavCA = `PavCA Index`, ID = `Rat ID`, `X5HT_Pre` = `5HT_Pre`, `X5HT_Post` = `5HT_Post`, `X5HT_Change` = `5HT_Change` ) nice_table(bind_rows( all.data %>% filter(Phenotype3 == "Control") %>% summarize(n = n()) %>% mutate(cutoff = "", Phenotype = "Control", .before = 1), all.data %>% filter(Phenotype3 != "Control") %>% reshape2::melt(measure.vars = c("Phenotype3", "Phenotype4", "Phenotype5"), variable.name = "cutoff", value.name = "Phenotype") %>% mutate(cutoff = str_replace(cutoff, "Phenotype", "0.")) %>% group_by(cutoff, Phenotype) %>% summarize(n = n()) )) .cl-223d3518{table-layout:auto;}.cl-22382dac{font-family:'Times New
